casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Anthonio Shontari FARRAR 112P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 10, 2017 David Weiss, Attorney at Law, for Farrar, Anthonio Shontari. Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th of April 2017 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 10th of April 2017."
